title: Fish batter
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '175ml beer', '350ml milk', '475g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 tablespoons cornflour', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1/8 teaspoon garlic powder', '675g cod or lemon sole fillets', '2 litres vegetable oil for frying']
